body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! This is Michael Henderson from Melody Sphere, the Music Store. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Martha. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm quite surprised actually. I noticed there's some issue with my personal playlist data being mixed up with someone else's.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that might be concerning, Martha. To address this issue, may I first confirm your date of birth and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is April 4th, one nine eight six, and my email address is martha.lee@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Martha. I'll start looking into your data management issue right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Michael. I really appreciate your help with this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, it's my pleasure to assist. We aim to ensure all our customers have a seamless and enjoyable experience with our service.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'll get back to you as soon as I have an update. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything for now. Thank you again.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Martha. Thank you for your time and for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
